casebody.data:
VALLEY PLAZA REALTY HIGHVIEW PROPERTIES III, Frank Greek and Son, Inc., Highview Properties, I, and Tices Properties, Plaintiffs,
v.
VERIZON NEW JERSEY, INC., f/k/a Bell Atlantic New Jersey, Inc., and Nynex Long Distance Company, d/b/a Verizon Enterprise, Defendant. M-6 September Term 2018
081330 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Civil Justice Institute for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted, limited to the brief that accompanied the motion.
